DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness Farsi diabetes self-management education program psychosocial , lifestyle , clinical measure people newly diagnose people type 2 diabetes already-diagnosed type two diabetes receive little self-management education . The development program guide innovative process intervention planning : Intervention Mapping .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Farsi Diabetes Self-management Education ( FDSME ) Program People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: For design management program , use Intervention Mapping ( IM ) framework systematically develop theory evidence base program . Based IM approach , study seven phase : Step 1 : need assessment ( Development problem analysis : health , quality life , behavior , environment ) . Step 2 : We develop proximal program objective multidisciplinary expert panel participant . Step 3 : After identification proximal program objective , next step select theoretical method practical strategy base evidence alternative method . Step 4 : The forth step program development comprise compose program material pre-testing material sample patient diabetic outpatient clinic . Step 5 : By involve future program facilitator ( health care worker outpatient clinic ) linkage system foreseen . Step 6 : planning evaluation Step 7 : Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes ( accord WHO criterion ) Older 18 year Pregnancy Unable participate group program ( example , housebound unable communicate Farsi ) Having reduce cognitive ability
